mapper.select: /*prsn 리스트*/ select T1.* from ( select row_number () over(order by trms_sn desc) as rn , trms_sn , trms_se_cd , (select cd_nm from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_code dcmc where cd_group = 'trms_se_cd' and cd ::numeric= trms_se_cd) as trms_se_cd_nm , ttl , use_yn , wrtr_nm , trms_cn , to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt from dqvs.dvs_cmm_mt_tcm where del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y' ) T1
